efforts.name: Comprehensive Documentation
efforts.description: Develop comprehensive documentation strategy and create documentation suite

tasks.title: ⭐ Audit existing documentation
tasks.description: Review all existing documentation. Identify gaps, outdated content, and areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Define documentation architecture
tasks.description: Design documentation structure and organization. Plan information architecture for easy navigation.

tasks.title: Establish documentation standards
tasks.description: Create style guides and templates. Ensure consistency and quality across all documentation.

tasks.title: Choose documentation platform
tasks.description: Select documentation platform and tools. Consider collaboration, versioning, and publishing features.

tasks.title: Plan documentation workflow
tasks.description: Define process for creating, reviewing, and updating documentation. Ensure documentation stays current.

tasks.title: Assign documentation ownership
tasks.description: Assign owners for different documentation areas. Ensure coverage and accountability.

tasks.title: ⭐ Write user documentation
tasks.description: Create user guides and tutorials. Make them clear, accessible, and focused on user needs.

tasks.title: Document APIs and integrations
tasks.description: Write comprehensive API documentation. Include examples, use cases, error codes, and authentication.

tasks.title: Create developer documentation
tasks.description: Document development processes, architecture, and code. Help developers be productive and consistent.

tasks.title: Build knowledge base
tasks.description: Create searchable knowledge base. Organize information for easy discovery and self-service support.

tasks.title: Create troubleshooting guides
tasks.description: Build comprehensive troubleshooting guides. Help users solve problems independently.

tasks.title: Add code examples
tasks.description: Include real, working code examples in documentation. Show users how to accomplish common tasks.

tasks.title: ⭐ Establish review process
tasks.description: Set up documentation review and approval process. Ensure accuracy, quality, and consistency.

tasks.title: Implement feedback mechanisms
tasks.description: Create ways for users to provide feedback. Act on feedback to improve documentation.

tasks.title: Plan documentation updates
tasks.description: Schedule regular documentation reviews and updates. Keep content current with product changes.

tasks.title: Measure documentation effectiveness
tasks.description: Track documentation usage and effectiveness. Improve based on metrics and user feedback.

tasks.title: Create documentation metrics
tasks.description: Define metrics for documentation quality: completeness, accuracy, usage, and user satisfaction.

tasks.title: Automate documentation
tasks.description: Automate documentation generation where possible. Generate API docs from code and keep them in sync.

efforts.name: Developer Resources
efforts.description: Create resources to help developers be productive

tasks.title: ⭐ Create getting started guide
tasks.description: Write comprehensive getting started guide. Help new developers set up environment and make first contributions.

tasks.title: Document development workflow
tasks.description: Document complete development workflow. Include setup, coding, testing, and deployment steps.

tasks.title: Create architecture documentation
tasks.description: Document system architecture, design decisions, and patterns. Help developers understand the system.

tasks.title: Write API reference
tasks.description: Create comprehensive API reference. Document all endpoints, parameters, responses, and examples.

tasks.title: Build code examples library
tasks.description: Create library of code examples. Show common patterns, best practices, and how to use features.

tasks.title: Document testing practices
tasks.description: Document testing strategies and practices. Help developers write effective tests.

projects.name: Developer Tools
projects.description: Create tools and resources for developers

tasks.title: ⭐ Create development templates
tasks.description: Build templates for common development tasks. Speed up development and ensure consistency.

tasks.title: Build code generators
tasks.description: Create code generators for repetitive tasks. Automate boilerplate and reduce manual work.

tasks.title: Set up developer portal
tasks.description: Create developer portal with all resources. Make it easy to find documentation, examples, and tools.

tasks.title: Create CLI tools
tasks.description: Build CLI tools for common developer tasks. Improve productivity and developer experience.

tasks.title: Document debugging guides
tasks.description: Create guides for debugging common issues. Help developers troubleshoot problems efficiently.

tasks.title: Set up developer feedback
tasks.description: Create channels for developer feedback. Gather input on tools, documentation, and developer experience.

efforts.name: Community & Content
efforts.description: Build community and create engaging content

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up community channels
tasks.description: Create spaces for community interaction: forums, chat, or discussion groups. Choose platforms that fit your users.

tasks.title: Create community guidelines
tasks.description: Establish guidelines for community participation. Set expectations for behavior and content.

tasks.title: Engage with community members
tasks.description: Actively participate in community discussions. Answer questions, share tips, and build relationships.

tasks.title: Organize community events
tasks.description: Plan and host community events: webinars, office hours, or meetups. Bring users together.

tasks.title: Highlight community contributions
tasks.description: Showcase work from community members. Feature examples, case studies, and success stories.

tasks.title: Gather community feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from community. Understand user needs, pain points, and feature requests.

projects.name: Content Creation
projects.description: Create content to educate and engage users

tasks.title: ⭐ Plan content strategy
tasks.description: Develop a content strategy. Plan blog posts, videos, and other content that educates and engages users.

tasks.title: Write technical blog posts
tasks.description: Create blog posts on technical topics. Share tips, best practices, and platform updates.

tasks.title: Create example projects
tasks.description: Build example projects that showcase platform capabilities. Provide code and documentation for users to learn from.

tasks.title: Produce video content
tasks.description: Create video content: demos, walkthroughs, and tutorials. Reach visual learners and provide engaging content.

tasks.title: Share success stories
tasks.description: Document and share success stories. Show how others are using the platform effectively.

tasks.title: Maintain content calendar
tasks.description: Plan and schedule regular content. Keep users engaged with consistent, valuable content.
